flavor: The server was quiet that night. I closed my eyes, the low-hum of the datastream lulling me into a trance. When I opened them, the construct stood before me in the shape of a man, clad in light of many colors. His stature was impressive, and his saccharine voice wormed its way into my very soul.
stripped_text: Interface -> Trash a card from your grip: Break 1 subroutine. Trash a card from your grip: +2 strength.
text: Interface -> Trash a card from your grip: Break 1 subroutine. Trash a card from your grip: +2 strength.
title: Faust

stripped_text: When you install Street Peddler, host the top 3 cards of your stack facedown on Street Peddler (you may look at these cards at any time). trash: Install 1 card hosted on Street Peddler, lowering its install cost by 1.
text:
When you install Street Peddler, host the top 3 cards of your stack facedown on Street Peddler (you may look at these cards at any time).

title: Street Peddler

stripped_text: Whenever you use a trash ability, draw 1 card.
text: Whenever you use a [trash] ability, draw 1 card.
title: Armand "Geist" Walker: Tech Lord

stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Expose 1 card installed in the root of a remote server. If you do and that card is an asset or upgrade, trash it.
text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Expose 1 card installed in the root of a remote server. If you do and that card is an asset or upgrade, trash it.
title: Drive By

flavor: Using the exact same rig as a million other people is just another form of security through anonymity.
stripped_text: +1{link} Interrupt -> trash: Prevent 1 tag. trash: Remove 1 tag. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1{link} [interrupt] -> [trash]: Prevent 1 tag. [trash]: Remove 1 tag. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Forger

stripped_text: If you have at least 2{link}, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. Interface -> 2click: Break any number of code gate subroutines. 2click: +3 strength.
text: If you have at least 2{link}, the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. Interface -> 2[click]: Break any number of code gate subroutines. 2[click]: +3 strength.
title: Shiv

flavor: Muertos has no fear of the law. Muertos is the law.
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, breach HQ. You cannot access cards in the root of HQ during this breach.
text: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, breach HQ. You cannot access cards in the root of HQ during this breach.
title: Gang Sign

flavor: La Señora de las Sombras giveth and taketh away.
stripped_text: When you install Muertos Gang Member, the Corp must derez a card. When Muertos Gang Member is uninstalled, the Corp may rez a card, ignoring the rez cost. trash: Draw 1 card.
text:
When you install Muertos Gang Member, the Corp must derez a card.
When Muertos Gang Member is uninstalled, the Corp may rez a card, ignoring the rez cost.
[trash]: Draw 1 card.
title: Muertos Gang Member

stripped_text: When you install this program, choose barrier, code gate, or sentry. When your discard phase ends, add this program to your grip. Interface > 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has the chosen subtype.
text: When you install this program, choose barrier, code gate, or sentry. When your discard phase ends, add this program to your grip. Interface > 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has the chosen subtype.
title: Chameleon

flavor: "It doesn't actually bend time. It just feels like it. That's relativity." -Hayley Kaplan
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may remove Hyperdriver from the game and gain click click click.
text: When your turn begins, you may remove Hyperdriver from the game and gain [click][click][click].
title: Hyperdriver

flavor:
"Isn't this wrong?"
"Not legally. They didn't read the fine print."

flavor: "Is your neighbor secretly a violent criminal? The answer to this chilling question and more, right after the break." -Shannon Claire, SSN 5

flavor: "Let me tell you a secret. There's no such thing as impenetrable ice. It has to allow access, or else why is the server on the Network in the first place? But that doesn't mean they have to make it easy." -g00ru
